price: ចូរអ្នកប្រាប់បណ្ដាខ្ញុំរបស់យើងថាៈ ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ យើងជាម្ចាស់មហាអភ័យទោស មហាអាណិតស្រឡាញ់។
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
